name: 群雄策・牌 Heroes Strategy・KARDS
name_original: 群雄策・牌 Heroes Strategy・KARDS
description:
"Heroes Strategy·KARDS" is a TCG card game with a relaxed competitive Hearthstone gameplay set in the Three Kingdoms. Players can summon hundreds of heroes of the Three Kingdoms to form troops to repel the enemy. The heroes mentioned here are cards in general games. During the game, players should adjust their card-playing strategy at all times according to the opponent's actual card-playing situation. Since the operation of playing and placing cards in the game needs to be done manually by the player, coupled with the interface similar to the poker table, it makes people feel like they are really playing cards.

Battle interface



In the battle of the game, players need to arrange and deploy their own combat strategies according to the situation of the opponent's cards, and the most important thing is to have a general understanding of the skills attached to each card in their hands.

Entering skills



Some cards have a sweeping effect that can deal physical damage to multiple cards of the enemy at once, while some cards have a meat shield attribute that can resist damage from enemy cards for their own heroes, and some can even deal with these damages rebound etc. And the effect of these cards will affect the balance of your victory in every battle. If you use it properly, you will have the power to defeat the strong with the weak.

Card collection



Of course, not all cards can allow you to have supernatural abilities. In the game "Heroes Strategy Cards", you also need to adjust and filter your own card group, and strengthen your own cards. Only in this way can we survive in the next series of battles. It is worth mentioning that if some cards have a transformation effect in battle, they can have stronger attributes and effects after transformation. Such a transformation card will act as a decisive factor in the battlefield, thereby reversing the situation and completing a single kill.

Heroes vying for the throne



The PVP gameplay of "Heroes Strategy·KARDS" is fundamentally different from other card games. Different from the value fight in the asynchronous arena, the PVP arena of "Heroes Strategy Cards" is a synchronous online duel. This requires the two sides of the competition to connect through the mobile phone network and wifi to ensure that they are online at the same time. During the game, after one party plays cards, the other party can play cards to meet. A maximum of two heroes can be played each round. If all the heroes of one party die or the summoner dies, the game ends.

Qualifying



The game of "Heroes Strategy·KARDS" provides a video mode, which is convenient for non-competitors to watch and communicate. In addition, there is a surrender mode in the game. If you encounter an opponent who is too powerful, admitting defeat directly is also a kind of respect for the opponent.

Card attributes



The hero cards in the game can enhance the attribute value of famous generals through functions such as advancement, star promotion, ascension, and transformation.

General skills



In addition to the special effects of the hero itself, in the game, you can also add more interesting effects to your heroes through enchantment. Matching different enchantments with the effects of famous generals can bring unexpected effects. You can try it, you may be pleasantly surprised!

Compared with more card games, "Heroes Strategy·KARDS" has more card game mechanisms and card content settings worth trying, plus a variety of heroes from the Three Kingdoms. Rich stories and grand battlefields, if you are a player who is interested in the heroes of the Three Kingdoms or card battles, then you might as well give it a try, the game "Heroes Strategy·Kards" will definitely bring you Get some good gaming experience.
